organic.title: CTRC Locations | CCTSI
organic.snippet: Only IRB-approved protocols can request CTRC services. CTRC units are available at: CU Anschutz; University of Colorado Hospital; Children's Hospital Colorado

organic.title: Directions to CTRC | Clinical Translational Research Center
organic.snippet: Lot 380 Boulder, CO 80309 or 40.0096,-105.2713 Coming from HWY 36. Please park in one of the 4 CTRC parking spots in the South East Corner of the lot.
